thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Synchronoss Receives Positive Nasdaq Panel Decision

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Synchronoss Receives Positive Nasdaq Panel Decision

organizations.name: nasdaq panel decision synchronoss technologies inc

text:
Synchronoss Technologies Inc:
* SYNCHRONOSS RECEIVES POSITIVE NASDAQ PANEL DECISION * SYNCHRONOSS - GOT POSITIVE DECISION FROM NASDAQ HEARINGS PANEL, GRANTING EXTENSION TO REGAIN COMPLIANCE WITH LISTING REQUIREMENTS
* SYNCHRONOSS - UNDER EXTENSION, STOCK WILL REMAIN LISTED ON NASDAQ, SUBJECT TO COMPANY BECOMING CURRENT WITH SEC FILINGS ON OR BEFORE MAY 10
* SYNCHRONOSS - EXTENSION ALSO SUBJECT TO CO PROVIDING PANEL PERIODIC UPDATES REGARDING ONGOING RESTATEMENT OF FINANCIAL STATEMENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
